description:
Discover the freedom of paddling. This compact solo canoe has a shallow arch bottom that's stable and easy to handle on lakes or mellow rivers. The triple-layer plastic hull is the type of strong you wouldn't want to portage, but withstands the abuse of bony rivers and shorelines. A plastic hull is also pretty much maintenance free, leaving you more time to explore or take in the sunset from the best seat in the house.

  • Made of durable triple-layer polyethylene
  • Vinyl gunwales for maximum durability
  • Seat is nylon laced ash, thrwarts are ash
  • Comfortable carrying handles
  • Narrow design can be paddled with a canoe paddle or double-bladed kayak paddle
name: Old Town Discovery 119
